CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 19, 1945, pg. 17, reads: "Fielding Flashes - The youthful Pittsburgh Crawfords in field whose total ages average 22 years. Left to right Peatross, 1b; Johnson, ss; Daniels, 2b, and Atkins 3b. They open the current United States Baseball League season against Oscar Charleston's sensational Brooklyn Brown Dodgers at Forbes Field in a doubleheader Sunday, May 20."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Crawfords baseball players, Maurice Peatross, Jimmy "Jeep" Johnson, Eddie Daniels, and Joe Atkins, standing on field
